body:
I just downloaded and installed Bitcoin-Qt 0.9-RC2 for Windows.  No output is displayed for commands entered in the debug console.  The entered command is displayed but no results.
    
    11:30:26 dummy
    11:30:28 asdfasdsadfsafasfd
    11:33:17 getinfo

Edit: Further information

I noticed that the block count also stopped updating.  No error message in the log.  When I attempted to exit Bitcoin-Qt, the little window saying it is shutting down was displayed but never went away.  Sounds like something got hung up.  Not sure what you need to debug this.  I'm running on Windows 7 using the binaries posted by Gavin.

title: Bitcoin-Qt 0.9.0 RC2 hangs after entering a series of console commands
